author: colley5
title: A favourite!
review: My 4 yr old boy absolutely loves this piece.  With a fascination of all things related to earthworks, this piece is a hit with the two scoops.  Few pieces that makes it easy to build although the sign is easy to lose or break from a 4 year olds perpective.

author: mrmitch
title: Even if its a little out of scale -makes great addition to city
review: I do have a few 4+ sets as well as Jack Stone but I got this one because of the look of the man and the cool pieces on this set. I also liked the road sign. This is one of the only 4+ models I keep in the display cabinet built.  I really like this set!

author: Smallsam99
title: nice bulldozer, even for 4+
review: I like this set and think it is a good representation for minifgs and bigfigs alike! the set is built to both mini and bigfig scale. I like the classic look and thesign can be used in a lego city. The set may be junoirzed but it's one of the best. I reccomend this set because of universal use and say to get it for about 5-15 dollars. I rate it about a 8.5/10.
